allow:
Bash(# Move setup-related scripts
mv run-ubuntu-setup.sh wsl-native-setup.sh clean-ubuntu-setup.sh setup-ubuntu.bat scripts/setup/
mv nodesource_setup.sh scripts/setup/

# Move test-related scripts
mv test-*.bat test-*.sh test-*.ps1 scripts/testing/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv START_TEST.cmd verify-setup.cmd scripts/testing/

# Move fix-related scripts
mv fix-*.sh fix-*.ps1 EXECUTE_FIX.bat RUN_NOW.bat quick-fix.bat scripts/fixes/
mv restart-service-with-fix.sh monitor-fuse-logs.sh scripts/fixes/

# Move old start scripts
mv start-one-filer*.bat scripts/archive/

# Move package creation scripts
mv create-test-package*.sh simple-test-package.ps1 scripts/archive/
mv build-with-local-deps.ps1 download-deps.ps1 scripts/archive/

# Move remaining misc scripts
mv lsone.sh run-task7-test.bat scripts/archive/)
